mapper.sql: id, dataset_id, data_id, classification_id, option_id, option_path, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO data_classification_option (dataset_id, data_id, classification_id, option_id, option_path) VALUES
( #{item.datasetId}, #{item.dataId}, #{item.classificationId}, #{item.optionId}, #{item.optionPath,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: SELECT cdss.*, tmp.dataAmount FROM data_classification_option cdss INNER JOIN ( SELECT classification_id, leaf_option_id, count(*) as dataAmount FROM dataset_classification dc INNER JOIN data_classification_option cds ON dc.id = cds.classification_id WHERE cds.dataset_id = #{datasetId} GROUP BY cds.classification_id, cds.leaf_option_id ORDER BY dataAmount DESC ) AS tmp ON cdss.classification_id = tmp.classification_id AND cdss.leaf_option_id = tmp.leaf_option_id
